text: Ne nachaka okhehenga mumisiko chiabu nashili okhuhenga mukwomusiani wabu. Mana nashirusia mumusiko kwomusiani wabu. Endio nilwakhwakholela Yusuf, shiyali unyala okhwikalila Omusiani wabu khumalako komwami wa Misr halali shinga Nyasaye yenya. Khuchingulanga hekulu bakhwenya, ne hekulu wa bulu omumanyi khuliwo nende omumanyi muno
